desc: Our mission is to bring affordable, reusable, salvageable items to our customers in our surrounding communities and keep them out of our landfills. We offer free estimates for your Junk removal! 5% of our all our proceeds goes to the local The Salvation Army food bank. Discover amazing deals today!

layout.text: + 5% Goes to The Salvation Army Food Bank ($8,042.94 donated to date ❤️)
